title: UIFace Job Schedules
content:

UIfacade Job Schedules

 

  • UIfacade Job Schedules
  • Creating a Job Schedule
  • Editing a Job Schedule
  • Deleting a Job Schedule
    • Field Description
    • Action Buttons

This page allows you to create, view, edit and delete UIFacade Jobs which can be scheduled as per the need. This assists further in the automation of product allocation, as the jobs can be scheduled at regular intervals or for a distinct number of times. 

 

Creating a Job Schedule

 

To create a new Job Schedule:

 

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > UIFacade > UIFacade Job Schedules.
  2. Click Create Job Schedule to view the Create New Job Schedule window.
  3. On the Job Schedule page,  select the Job Type from the drop-down, Job Schedule Name, and Cron Expression. Choose Yes or No for Disabled to confirm whether the job should stay paused once created. Click Save and Continue.
  4. On the Job Schedule Details page, enter the values for Start Delay (milliseconds), Repeat Interval (milliseconds), and Trigger Key. If you select Yes for Ad Hoc Job, the job will be deleted once it is completed. Enter a value for Time Zone and click Save and Continue.
  5. On the Job Parameters page, choose from the given parameters, or click on Add New to add a new parameter. For a new parameter, enter a value for Parameter Name and Parameter Value, then click Submit. Once the parameter is selected, click Save And Finish.
Note: All mandatory fields are denoted with *.

Editing a Job Schedule

 

To edit a job schedule:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > UIFacade  > UIFacade Job Schedules.
  2. Select the required job record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  3. In the Job Schedule window, modify the required fields.
  4. Click Save to save the modified job details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required job record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Job Schedule window, modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save to save the modified job details.

 

Deleting a Job Schedule

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > UIFacade  > UIFacade Job Schedules.
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'This action will delete the strategy and any related criteria which are not referenced in other strategies'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the job.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'This action will delete the strategy and any related criteria which are not referenced in other strategies'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the job.

 

Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Job Type Specifies the type of the job.
Job Schedule Name Displays the given name for the job.
Cron Expression Represents the cron expression for the scheduler.
Disabled Specifies whether the job is paused.
Parameter Name Specifies the parameter name.
Parameter Value Specifies the parameter value.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Create Job Schedule Opens the Create New Job Schedule window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the Job Schedule window for editing the selected record.
Delete Deletes the selected record.
View Opens the Job Schedule window for a detailed view.
